name: 13th Or Bust
description:
FULLSCREEN & HEADPHONES RECOMMENDED

controls: WASD and Mouse

Made for Zenojam 3: "It Never Ends".

All assets (with the exception of the public-domain fonts) were crafted by yours truly. I had already made two of the songs prior to this project, but other than that, all was made during the jam.

Images were made in Gimp, audio was made in FL Studio and Audacity.
